column4: i am gettin this error when i try and play a dvd Unable to mount the selected volume Error: could not execute pmount what does it mean and how do i fix it so i can use my dvd
add your user to the "plugdev" group
you can do that in the "users&groups" tool in the menu
there is no group called plugdev in user & groups
plugdev is called somethin else when i try to add plugdev it say it already exist
what's the output of 'id' for you?
do iput that in the terminal
uid=1000(sunshine) gid=1000(sunshine) groups=29(audio),109(admin),1000(sunshine)
yes, just add you
sudo adduser sunshine plugdev
that's the command line method of doing this
but the gnome tool does the same
ok that done what do i do now
ok that done what do i do now
oh, sorry, you have to logout and back in to make the change effective
im gettin this error now Failed to play Audio/Video Disc Failed to open device /dev/hdd for reading: Permission denied this is in totem
ah, you also need to be in "cdrom"
the initial user that is installed is put into all these shiny groups automatically - how did you end up in not being in all of them?
i dont know
you should be in audio, video, plugdev, scanner, lpadmin, dialout, adm, floppy, and admin
i. e. just select the "Administrator" profile in the user admin tool
i only have sunshine in my user group
in user& group tab
